string-array.name: myQuotes
string-array.item: \"If it\'s the thought that counts, then I should probably be in jail"
\"I\'ve taken up Photography beause it\'s the only hobby here you can shoot people and cut their heads off without going to jail"
\"Sometimes I wish I was a bird... So I could fly over certain people and poop on their heads!"
\"My teacher pointed me with his ruler and said:"At the end of this ruler there's an idiot! I got detention after asking which end."
\"One way to find out if you are old is to fall down in front of a lot of people. If they laugh, you\'re still young. If they panic and start running to you, you\'re old"
